LanguageData.DevModeResetAllConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to original values? If you were locked out of the Mod Settings from an exception, you will need to restart after the reset.
LanguageData.DebugLoggingTooltip: Enable message logging to output specific values and pieces of information useful for debugging Vehicles. Use only if you're making a Vehicle add-on.
LanguageData.DebugPathCostRecalculationLoggingTooltip: Log summary of path cost change for all vehicles affected by region dirtying.
LanguageData.DebugWriteVehiclePathingCostsTooltip: Draw path costs calculated from pathfinder on the map, highlighting every cell searched as well as the accumulated path cost.
LanguageData.DebugDraftAnyVehicleTooltip: Be able to draft and move any vehicle regardless of passengers. Useful for empty boats in deep water or if you want to expedite testing.
LanguageData.DebugDisablePathingTooltip: Disable boats using custom water based pathfinding, and instead use vanilla pathfinding. NOTE: Boats will travel like pawns.
LanguageData.DebugSpawnVehiclesGodModeTooltip: Vehicle blueprints being placed in godmode will spawn the Building variant as opposed to generating a VehiclePawn for spawning.
LanguageData.DebugDrawUpgradeNodeGridTooltip: Draw UpgradeTree grid for placement on (x,y) axis.
LanguageData.DebugDrawHitboxTooltip: Draw vehicle's hitbox by highlighting the map cells the vehicle occupies.
LanguageData.DebugDrawVehicleTracksTooltip: Draw cells occupied by vehicle's "VehicleTracks" which mark what cells will end up being damaged per move action.
LanguageData.DebugDrawBumpersTooltip: Draw cells immediately in front of vehicle that will indicate when the vehicle "bumps" into something and halts pathing.
